overview: Filmed live at GraceLife Church in Columbia, South Carolina. Marty talks about his kids, football, taking it like a man, looking for lost dogs, spelling bees, roller coasters and "the code". Everything he says is a true story based on something that either happened to him, his kids, or that he made up entirely. He also talks about the chief purpose of man and being Christ-like.
title: Clean If It Kills Me
